properties.name: vite
properties.description: Vite Thymeleaf Settings for Spring MVC

properties.name: vite.manifest-file-path
properties.description: path of manifest.json made by Vite build

properties.name: vite.compile-asset-extension-array
properties.description: Comma-separated list of assets extensions written in thymeleaf html. it will be scan to change assets url to compiled by Vite

properties.name: vite.is-vite-dev-proxy-active
properties.description: If active vite dev server active for development
